eg

Class EditAreaFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.EditAreaFormat

  • public class EditAreaFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    The formatting (word wrap, font, display of line numbers) for EditArea objects.

    The font is applied to all objects, whereas wordwrap and the visibility of line numbers is applied to the currently viewed editor

    The initial parameters are given by entries in the prefs file.
